docs.text: miiid-schema Minimal Information about Intermicrobial Interaction Data schema URI: https://w3id.org/FAIR-MI/miiid-schema Name: miiid-schema Classes Class Description IntermicrobialInteractionCollection A holder for IntermicrobialInteraction objects NamedThing A generic grouping for any identifiable entity IntermicrobialInteraction Represents an interaction between microbial entities Slots Slot Description description A human-readable description for a thing entries An IntermicrobialInteraction object env_exp Biome term (from the Environmental Ontology) used in the experiment evidence_type Type of evidence used to determine the interaction using the Evidence and Con... id A unique identifier for a thing method_type One or several of the types of methods used to determine the interaction name A human-readable name for a thing participant_outcomes Outcomes of each of the participants described in the interaction when known participants Names of the microbial entities, with descriptions of any genetic manipulatio... reference Persistent identifier (e sequence_id Accession to the matching sequence data (e tax_id NCBI Taxonomy identifiers at the relevant taxonomic level Enumerations Enumeration Description MethodType List of methods used to determine interactions ParticipantOutcome Outcome indicating how each participant was affected Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification EnvExpId Term from the Environment Ontology following by their machine-actionable iden... Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer NCBITaxId Numeric identifier following the NCBI Taxonomy schema Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model SequenceId Sequence identifier to a (preferrably INSDC) database String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description

docs.text: Enum: MethodType List of methods used to determine interactions URI: MethodType Permissible Values Value Meaning Description simulation EDAM_TOPIC:3524 Any type of biological computational model experiments microscopy EDAM_TOPIC:3382 Any type of imaging-related experiments cultivation NCIT:C25300 Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms sample OBI:0000659 Any type of experiments based on the analysis of a sample Slots Name Description method_type One or several of the types of methods used to determine the interaction Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/FAIR-MI/miiid-schema LinkML Source name: MethodType description: List of methods used to determine interactions from_schema: https://w3id.org/FAIR-MI/miiid-schema rank: 1000 permissible_values: simulation: text: simulation description: Any type of biological computational model experiments meaning: EDAM_TOPIC:3524 examples: - value: generalized Lotka-Volterra model - value: genome-scale metabolic model microscopy: text: microscopy description: Any type of imaging-related experiments meaning: EDAM_TOPIC:3382 examples: - value: co-localization with fluorescent markers - value: assisted motility cultivation: text: cultivation description: Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms meaning: NCIT:C25300 examples: - value: continuous co-culture in bioreactor - value: co-plating on solid media sample: text: sample description: Any type of experiments based on the analysis of a sample meaning: OBI:0000659 examples: - value: co-occurrences drawn from analyses of abundances obtained from in situ or in vivo sampling
docs.title: Enum: MethodType

docs.text: Enum: PersonStatus URI: PersonStatus Permissible Values Value Meaning Description ALIVE PATO:0001421 the person is living DEAD PATO:0001422 the person is deceased UNKNOWN None the vital status is not known Slots Name Description vital_status living or dead status Identifier and Mapping Information Schema Source from schema: https://w3id.org/FAIR-MI/miiid-schema LinkML Source name: PersonStatus from_schema: https://w3id.org/FAIR-MI/miiid-schema rank: 1000 permissible_values: ALIVE: text: ALIVE description: the person is living meaning: PATO:0001421 DEAD: text: DEAD description: the person is deceased meaning: PATO:0001422 UNKNOWN: text: UNKNOWN description: the vital status is not known todos: - map this to an ontology

docs.text: miiid-schema A metadata schema for the Minimum Information about Intermicrobial Interaction Data (MIIID) using LinkML Name: miiid-schema Play around with the schema, some examples and your own data using validamiiid . IntermicrobialInteraction Represents an interaction between microbial entities Slots Slot Description description A human-readable description for a thing entries An IntermicrobialInteraction object env_exp Biome term (from the Environmental Ontology) used in the experiment evidence_type Type of evidence used to determine the interaction using the Evidence and Con... id A unique identifier for a thing method_type One or several of the types of methods used to determine the interaction name A human-readable name for a thing participant_outcomes Outcomes of each of the participants described in the interaction when known participants Names of the microbial entities, with descriptions of any genetic manipulatio... reference Persistent identifier (e sequence_id Accession to the matching sequence data (e tax_id NCBI Taxonomy identifiers at the relevant taxonomic level Enumerations Enumeration Description MethodType List of methods used to determine interactions ParticipantOutcome Outcome indicating how each participant was affected Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification EnvExpId Term from the Environment Ontology following by their machine-actionable iden... Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer NCBITaxId Numeric identifier following the NCBI Taxonomy schema Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model SequenceId Sequence identifier to a (preferrably INSDC) database String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE
docs.title: miiid-schema

docs.text: A metadata schema for the Minimum Information about Intermicrobial Interaction Data (MIIID) using LinkML Name: miiid-schema Play around with the schema, some examples and your own data using validamiiid . IntermicrobialInteraction Represents an interaction between microbial entities

docs.text: Slot Description description A human-readable description for a thing entries An IntermicrobialInteraction object env_exp Biome term (from the Environmental Ontology) used in the experiment evidence_type Type of evidence used to determine the interaction using the Evidence and Con... id A unique identifier for a thing method_type One or several of the types of methods used to determine the interaction name A human-readable name for a thing participant_outcomes Outcomes of each of the participants described in the interaction when known participants Names of the microbial entities, with descriptions of any genetic manipulatio... reference Persistent identifier (e sequence_id Accession to the matching sequence data (e tax_id NCBI Taxonomy identifiers at the relevant taxonomic level

docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification EnvExpId Term from the Environment Ontology following by their machine-actionable iden... Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer NCBITaxId Numeric identifier following the NCBI Taxonomy schema Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model SequenceId Sequence identifier to a (preferrably INSDC) database String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.text: miiid-schema A metadata schema for the Minimum Information about Intermicrobial Interaction Data (MIIID) using LinkML Name: miiid-schema Play around with the schema, some examples and your own data using validamiiid . Classes Class Description IntermicrobialInteractionCollection A holder for IntermicrobialInteraction objects NamedThing A generic grouping for any identifiable entity IntermicrobialInteraction Represents an interaction between microbial entities Slots Slot Description description A human-readable description for a thing entries An IntermicrobialInteraction object env_exp Biome term (from the Environmental Ontology) used in the experiment evidence_type Type of evidence used to determine the interaction using the Evidence and Con... id A unique identifier for a thing method_type One or several of the types of methods used to determine the interaction name A human-readable name for a thing participant_outcomes Outcomes of each of the participants described in the interaction when known participants Names of the microbial entities, with descriptions of any genetic manipulatio... reference Persistent identifier (e sequence_id Accession to the matching sequence data (e tax_id NCBI Taxonomy identifiers at the relevant taxonomic level Enumerations Enumeration Description MethodType List of methods used to determine interactions ParticipantOutcome Outcome indicating how each participant was affected Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification EnvExpId Term from the Environment Ontology following by their machine-actionable iden... Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer NCBITaxId Numeric identifier following the NCBI Taxonomy schema Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model SequenceId Sequence identifier to a (preferrably INSDC) database String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description
docs.title: miiid-schema

docs.text: A metadata schema for the Minimum Information about Intermicrobial Interaction Data (MIIID) using LinkML Name: miiid-schema Play around with the schema, some examples and your own data using validamiiid .

docs.text: Slot Description description A human-readable description for a thing entries An IntermicrobialInteraction object env_exp Biome term (from the Environmental Ontology) used in the experiment evidence_type Type of evidence used to determine the interaction using the Evidence and Con... id A unique identifier for a thing method_type One or several of the types of methods used to determine the interaction name A human-readable name for a thing participant_outcomes Outcomes of each of the participants described in the interaction when known participants Names of the microbial entities, with descriptions of any genetic manipulatio... reference Persistent identifier (e sequence_id Accession to the matching sequence data (e tax_id NCBI Taxonomy identifiers at the relevant taxonomic level

docs.text: Enumeration Description MethodType List of methods used to determine interactions ParticipantOutcome Outcome indicating how each participant was affected

docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification EnvExpId Term from the Environment Ontology following by their machine-actionable iden... Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer NCBITaxId Numeric identifier following the NCBI Taxonomy schema Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model SequenceId Sequence identifier to a (preferrably INSDC) database String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE
